verses.text: And when he had called unto himhis twelve disciples, he gave them power againstunclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease.
Now the names of the twelve apostles are these; The first, Simon, who is called Peter, and Andrew his brother; James the sonof Zebedee, and John his brother;
Philip, and Bartholomew; Thomas, and Matthew the publican; James the sonof Alphaeus, and Lebbaeus, whose surname was Thaddaeus;
Simon the Canaanite, and Judas Iscariot, who also betrayed him.
